attributes.action: I would like to see Nigel Farage rewarded for his commitment to Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Government & Parliament debate & recognise that certain people in public life deserve recognition for the work & commitment shown to UK life. Nigel Farage has shown this commitment over many years. He has stood firm in his believe, supported by 17.4 million voters. There has been a personal cost, and, unlike others who have been recognised, e.g. sportsmen/women, has given much more to the democratic process of the UK.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has spent a large portion of his life fighting for the democratic process and should be rewarded for this effort. I would like parliament to debate this matter & consider the possibility of a recognition for Mr Farage.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
